1st Ania 15

3rd Leia Organa 1

May the force be with you!

During the game you need to select from available options who or what from Star Wars is shown on the picture. Your goal is to answer as many questions correctly as possible. There is a time limit for each game, so remember that you have to answer as fast as you can.

Game
Who is this character?
